post.text: "The lesson she passed on to me was simple but powerful: No one gets through life alone." â€”Hillary on her mom, Dorothy

comment.author: Christopher
comment.text: Everyone recheck your voter registration! Republicans are taking people off the voter rolls, especially minority voters. CHECK YOUR REGISTRATION AND RE-REGISTER IF YOU WERE ELIMINATED! Don't let the GOP suppress your vote!

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: Why's are you voting blindly ?, just realesed the Clintons foundation, only six percent from it went to charitable expenditures, from the American journal

replies.author: Tanner
replies.text: That's not true. Show me proof of that.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: Agree. It's called voter vetting laws - check in your state as to what party wants proof of things that poorer people might not have. It's the GOP all the way. Here in Texas it went to the Supreme Court and the new laws were shot down, but they are doing everything they can to make it difficult for them.
